attributes.action: Grant equality of treatment to the veterans of the campaign in Northern Ireland.
attributes.additional_details: I am a volunteer working with Forces Veterans, and a Veteran myself.  Many of them are suffering from PTSD and the threat of protection for some of them is cruel and unjust and adding even more pressure to their problems
attributes.background: The Good Friday agreement did not give equality of treatment to the British Forces, and now many years later Veterans in their 70’s are facing prosecution for alleged actions in that campaign.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You may want to sign this petition that we think is similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/243947
